notes.text:
The key is to work quickly so the eggs don't scramble
Use the pasta water to create a silky sauce
Always remove from heat before adding the egg mixture

steps.descr: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by bringing a large pot of salted water to a boil. Once it's bubbling away, pop in the spaghetti and cook it according to the package instructions. Keep an eye on it so it doesn't overcook!

steps.instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions

steps.descr: While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large pan until crispy

on_enter.say: Now, while the pasta is cooking, let's get that pancetta sizzling in a pan. Fry it until it's beautifully crispy and golden. You'll know it's ready when it smells irresistible!

steps.instructions: While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large pan until crispy

steps.descr: In a bowl, whisk together egg yolks, grated Parmesan, and lots of black pepper

on_enter.say: Let's move on to the sauce. In a bowl, whisk together those lovely egg yolks, a generous amount of grated Parmesan, and plenty of black pepper. This is going to be the heart of our creamy carbonara!

steps.instructions: In a bowl, whisk together egg yolks, grated Parmesan, and lots of black pepper

steps.descr: Reserve 1 cup of pasta water, then drain pasta

on_enter.say: Before you drain the pasta, remember to reserve a cup of that starchy pasta water. It's going to help us create a silky sauce. Once you've got that, go ahead and drain the pasta.

steps.instructions: Reserve 1 cup of pasta water, then drain pasta

steps.descr: Remove pan from heat, add hot pasta to pancetta

on_enter.say: Right, let's take the pan off the heat and add the hot pasta to the crispy pancetta. Give it a good toss so everything's nicely mixed together.

steps.instructions: Remove pan from heat, add hot pasta to pancetta

steps.descr: Quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water gradually until creamy

on_enter.say: Now, let's work quickly to stir in the egg mixture. Add the reserved pasta water a little at a time until you achieve a lovely creamy consistency. Remember, we don't want scrambled eggs, just a silky sauce!

steps.instructions: Quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water gradually until creamy

steps.descr: Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and black pepper

on_enter.say: Fantastic! It's time to serve up this delicious carbonara. Sprinkle over some extra Parmesan and a good crack of black pepper. Enjoy your meal!

steps.instructions: Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and black pepper

recipe.title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
recipe.description: Creamy, rich Italian pasta with crispy pancetta and parmesan
